law.catch_line: License for driver training school and driver training instructor required.

text.section: A person shall not operate, conduct, maintain, or establish a driver training school unless the person holds a valid current license issued by the department.
A person shall not operate, conduct, maintain, or establish a driver training school unless the school has in its employ at least one (1) licensed driver training instructor.

A person shall not act as an instructor for a driver training school unless the person:
Holds a valid current license as an instructor issued by the department; and
Is employed by a licensed driver training school.

law.history: Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 2, effective March 31, 2003.
